Description: Space-separated list of [terrain module IDs](https://forum.dcs.world/topic/324040-eagle-dynamics-modular-dedicated-server-installer) to install when the server is updated. WARNING: Installing all terrains requires more than 400GB of disk space. The SUPERCARRIER and WWII-ARMOUR modules are installed by default and do not need to be specified here
Space-separated list of [terrain module IDs](https://forum.dcs.world/topic/324040-eagle-dynamics-modular-dedicated-server-installer) to uninstall when the server is updated
